mapper.select: SELECT * FROM article WHERE board_no = (SELECT board_no FROM board WHERE board_name = #{board_name})

SELECT article_no, article_pno, article.board_no, board_name, member_nick, article_name, article_content, article_recommends, article_views, article_images, article_ip, article_reports, article_created_time, article_changed_time, article_isDeleted FROM article, member, board WHERE board.board_no = article.board_no AND member.member_no = article.member_no AND article.article_no = #{articleNo}

SELECT member_nick, reply_no, reply_pno, reply_ip, reply_created_time, reply_changed_time, reply_recommends, reply_reports, reply_isDeleted, reply_content FROM reply, member WHERE reply.article_no = #{articleNO} AND reply.member_no = member.member_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (member_id, member_pw, member_nick, member_email, member_phone, member_gender, member_created_date) VALUES (#{member_id}, #{member_pw}, #{member_nick}, #{member_email}, #{member_phone}, #{member_gender}, now())

INSERT INTO article (article_pno, board_no, member_no, article_name, article_content, article_recommends, article_views, article_images, article_ip, article_reports, article_created_time) VALUES (#{article_pno}, #{board_no}, #{member_no}, #{article_name}, #{article_content}, 0, 0, 0, #{article_ip}, 0, now());

INSERT INTO reply (reply_pno, board_no, article_no, member_no, reply_content, reply_recommends, reply_images, reply_ip, reply_reports, reply_created_time) VALUES (#{reply_pno}, #{board_no}, #{article_no}, #{member_no}, #{content}, 0, 0, #{reply_ip}, 0, now());
